title: Covid Connect
brief: Chat with a robot about covid tough times.
description: Covid Connect offers you the opportunity to chat with an automated chatbot which is collecting stories of experiences during the Covid-19 pandemic. While you chat with the bot, your comments will be matched with the stories of others, which you can explore. The purpose of this project is to provide visitors an opportunity to tell their stories and to create a

title: Card - IT
brief: Learn languages and have fun while doing it
description: Collaborated in designing a web app that serves as a mental health chatbot for people working from home. Developing a frontend and visualization system that allows users to view stories of others that are similar to their own.

title: Zelda Timeline
brief: A new take on the Zelda timeline
description: e purpose of this project is to provide visitors an opportunity to tell their stories and to create a sense of community. All chat conversations will be collected to create a public record of experiences in the Covid-19 pandemic. s collecting stories of experiences during the Covid-19 pandemic. While you chat with the bot, your comments will be matched with the stories of others, which you can explore. The purpose of this project is to provide visitors an opportunity to tell their stories and to create a sense of community. All chat conversations will be collected to create a public record of experiences in the Covid-19 pandemic.
